DOC.brief_summary: Patients mechanical ventilation show improved weaning rate enteral tube feed high EPA , GLA antioxidant feed patient critical care set . LTAC Patients chronic mechanical ventilation decrease day mechanical ventilation , decreased mortality rate decrease organ failure feed enteral product high EPA , GLA antioxidant compare isotonic high fiber enteral nutrition product .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Oxepa Enteral Feeding LTAC ( Long Term Acute Care Hospital ) Patients Chronic Ventilation- Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Respiratory failure mechanical ventilation failure wean Diagnosis ARDS ( Acute respiratory Distress Syndrome ) Bilateral infiltrate History Of pulmonary fibrosis , Terminal illness/ malignancy , < 28 day life expectancy , Hemodialysis , Active bleed bleed disorder : DIC ( Disseminated intravascular Coagulation ) , Sickle Cell Anemia , Hemophilia Hemorrhagic ischemic stroke , Liver failure , Head trauma Glasgow coma scale score < 5 , Immunosuppression : WBC ( White Blood Cell Count ) < 5000 , HIV positive , use immunosuppressant drug , Pregnancy , Heart Failure EF ( Ejection Fraction ) < 35 %
